solution_code: public class Solution {--newline--    public static int minPatches(int[] nums, int n) {--newline--        long max = 0;--newline--        int cnt = 0;--newline--        for (int i = 0; max < n;) {--newline--            if (i >= nums.length || max < nums[i] - 1) {--newline--                max += max + 1;--newline--                cnt++;--newline--            } else {--newline--                max += nums[i];--newline--                i++;--newline--            }--newline--        }--newline--        return cnt;--newline--    }--newline--    --newline--}
